sentences.english: Wearing lower degree convex lens can reduce incidence rate of myopia in primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 配戴低度凸透鏡可降低小學生近視的發生率。

sentences.english: Convex glass is used to magnify an image.
sentences.chinese: 凸透鏡是用來放大圖像。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of lower degree convex lens on preventing myopia of primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討低度凸透鏡預防小學生視近的效果。

sentences.english: In this paper, a measuring method of convex lens foci in collimator is given.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種測量平行光管內凸透鏡焦距的測量方法。

sentences.english: A convex lens is thicker at its center than its periphery. It causes rays to converge.
sentences.chinese: 凸透鏡中心部分比周圍要厚，它使光線會聚。

sentences.english: Conclusion Wearing lower degree convex lens can reduce incidence rate of myopia in primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 結論配戴低度凸透鏡可降低小學生近視的發生率。

sentences.english: A single convex lens is used to produce an enlarged image.
sentences.chinese: 能夠產生放大圖像的單個凸透鏡。
